Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off George Coletti (STL)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2015, hitting .267 with 9 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against St. Louis (C) on 7/4/2015...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 8/29/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2015, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2016, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
